entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:02 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:02 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:02 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
